Title: Authorizes physician assistants under the supervision of a physician to perform most medical services that a physician can perform
Summary: Authorizes physician assistants under the supervision of a physician to perform most medical services that a physician can perform, including the signing of death certificates.
LawCode: Amd Pub Health L, generally; amd §§6540, 6542, 6731, 6741, 6807, 6909, 6957 & 7901, add §6545-a, Ed L; amd §461-c, Soc Serv L; amd §§13-b & 13-c, Work Comp L; amd §33.04, Ment Hyg L; amd §406, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the education law, the social services law, the workers' compensation law, the mental hygiene law and the general business law, in relation to clarifying the scope of practice of licensed physician assistants
